name: Killeidoscope
description:
Killeidoscope is a game made in 5 days for the One Minute Game Jam #5! For the jam you have to make a game that only contains one minute worth of gameplay and has to be in some way related to the theme "Colorful". To fit in the theme, my game is a top down shooter where you have to see enemies camouflaged in the RGB backgrounds flying behind the player.

Controls: Left ClickShootEscapeReturn to Menu Credits:

Music used:

Game Over by Karl Casey https://karlcasey.bandcamp.com 

Promoted by @RoyaltyFreePlanet - https://royaltyfreeplanet.com
